org.openimaj.math.geometry.path

Class Polyline

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.geometry.point.PointList
      • org.openimaj.math.geometry.path.Polyline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Iterable<Point2d>, GeometricObject2d, Path2d

    public class Polyline
extends PointList
implements Path2d
    A polyline is a Path2d implicitly made up of Line2d segments based on the assumption of ordered points held in a PointList.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
